channel.title: Vim on $ linux docs
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on $ linux docs

item.title: Vim Shortcuts
item.description: Navigation h j k l - Move cursor left/down/up/right w - Jump to start of next word b - Jump to start of previous word 0 - Jump to start of line $ - Jump to end of line gg - Jump to start of file G - Jump to end of file Editing i - Insert mode before cursor a - Insert mode after cursor dd - Delete line yy - Yank (copy) line p - Paste after cursor u - Undo Ctrl+r - Redo File Operations :w - Save file :q - Quit :wq - Save and quit :q!
